data.title: Front-end developer
data.responsibilities: Even though I enjoyed the team lead experience, I went back to coding in the front-end... I still coach external people though. I program web applications in React, but also hybride mobile apps in React Native and Flutter. The 'VanheedePlus' app is one of the projects I co-created. I also coach IT-teams of clients & I am invested in speaking in front of an audience.

data.title: Stack Architect & Team Lead
data.responsibilities: I helped to create Meditech products together with a team of 4 developers. I introduced the Agile mindset in the team. Near the end I had redrawn the entire stack towards a service-based architecture. The architecture was loosely coupled and had the ability to serve data 40 times faster and was 200 times more resilient (in comparison to the previous monolith).

data.title: Full stack lead webdeveloper
data.responsibilities: Made around 150-200 websites and e-commerce webshops using Concrete5 and Magento. The traffic generated to those websites ranged from 100 views/month to more than 25000 views/month. I guided one other developer & also coached the clients in the Concrete5 CMS. The servers ran on Linux, which I updated and maintained.

data.title: PL/SQL & Java trainee
data.responsibilities: A unified single sign-on for all ADMB products. After a while working in Java, I leaned back towards other technologies.

data.title: Software engineer
data.responsibilities: The on-screen manual of televisions for 1 year & build PHP-driven web applications for internal use.

data.title: Drupal webdeveloper
data.responsibilities: Biggest project was a multi-site system for a political party. This accumulated to around 300 websites and 150000 views/month. I did theming, configuration, custom module coding & slicing of design
